description.title: Description
description.paragraph: Enthusiastic frontend developer with a passion for creating engaging, user-friendly web experiences. Eager to join a collaborative team where I can learn, grow, and make a meaningful impact on projects. Motivated to bring fresh ideas and a strong work ethic to every challenge.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph: As a frontend developer, I create intuitive, beautiful, and efficient web experiences. I focus on blending design and functionality, ensuring accessibility for all users. Collaboration and constant learning drive me to keep improving in a field that’s always evolving.

beyondTheCode.title: Beyond the code
items: Curious learner exploring novels, theology and philosophy.
Dancer with years of experience in movement and rhythm.
Gym enthusiast, sports lover, constantly active.
Musician at heart—guitar, percussion, and some vocals.
I would like to be able to fly...
